MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 17-OCT-2020 17:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY4 postcode area of Harmer Hill and Yorton Heath, affecting properties in Wem Road, Shotton Lane and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm for safety following an overhead line brought done by a tractor. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 5.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.15pm on 17th of October 2020.
